title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 37.3 - Sales of dairy products and melloream in stores
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 37.3 - Sales of dairy products and melloream in stores

State Regulations

Whenever milk or other liquid dairy products and melloream
are displayed and offered for sale in the same refrigerator or refrigerated
case, the milk and/or other liquid dairy products shall be separated from the
melloream by some other product which is neither a liquid dairy product nor
melloream. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1
ยง
37.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
